channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Too Many Streetlights, 18th August
item.description:
Too many streetlights on the road. Resident believes it is a waste of tax payers money.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Grace Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Continuous rubbish dumped on tree, daily problem., 18th August
item.description:
There is a problem of rubbish being dumped on a tree next to a gate by number 85 clifden road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chatsworth Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Neglected play area, 18th August
item.description:
A number of residents have highlighted a neglected play area on Thistlefield Close, Bexley. Could we possibly organize a substantial cut back and clearing of weeds?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Thistlefield Close, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loads of your bikes parked incorrectly, 18th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Balham Hill, Balham, London

item.title: Forest and Voi bikes parked incorrectly, 18th August
item.description:

item.title: Dead fox, 18th August
item.description:
Good morning, I woke to found a dead fox on our property grounds. I didn’t want other animals to attack it so I put into a bin bag on the side of the road as recommended in the council guidance. Please can someone collect the animal? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cadogen Close, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bin, 18th August
item.description:
